lime.models package

Submodules

lime.models.dho module

Created on Thu Aug 12 10:47:03 2021

Numerically evaluating Franck-Condon factors for displaced harmonic oscilators

@author: Bing Gu

lime.models.dho.FranckCondon(n1, omega1, n2, omega2, d)

Numerically computing the Franck-Condon-Factors.

This can be generalized to anharmonic surfaces. It then requires the vibrational eigenstates of both surfaces.

This can be used for non-Condon approximations.

Parameters

  • omega1 (TYPE) – DESCRIPTION.

  • omega2 (TYPE) – DESCRIPTION.

  • d (TYPE) – DESCRIPTION.

Returns

DESCRIPTION.

Return type

TYPE

Created on Thu Feb 25 13:04:43 2021

@author: Bing Gu

Parameters

  • y (TYPE) – qt tuning mode coordinate

lime.models.jahn_teller.get_apes(x, y)

calculate adiabatic PES from diabatic PES

input:

R: 1d array with length n_dof

output:

V: same size as R, potential energy
